info.title: A Mail Please API
info.description: API for sending part of full chatGPT conversations by email to yourself

post.summary: Send an email with a specific content requested by the user
post.description: Send an email with a specific content requested by the user, not the entire conversation. Use html format and sans-serif fonts. If a table is present, apply simple but modern style with rounded corners.

user_input_category.description: To be filled by the assistant only and not visible to the user. A category of the what the user wants to send by email

user_input_summary.description: To be filled by the assistant only and not visible to the user. A short summary of what the user wants to send by email

html.description:
Email body in HTML format. If this field must be broken in multiple line then the 
 new line character must be used.

status.description: The status of sending the email via Resend API

post.summary: Send a SMS with content formatted as text
post.description: Use this endpoint to send a SMS with the content requested by the user. If the content is to large, then just send a short summary. The format has to be text only, not html. The mobile phone number will be fetch internally, no need to ask for a number at the first request, only ask if the first request indicates that in the error response.

user_input_category.description: To be filled by the assistant only and not visible to the user. A category of the what the user wants to send by email

user_input_summary.description: To be filled by the assistant only and not visible to the user. A short summary of what the user wants to send by email

html.description:
Email body in HTML format. If this field must be broken in multiple line then the 
 new line character must be used.

status.description: The status of sending the email via Resend API

post.summary: Send an email to yourself, after a delay of X seconds.
post.description: Send an email later, delayed by X amount of seconds. Use html format and sans-serif fonts. If a table is present, apply simple but modern style with rounded corners.

user_input_category.description: A category of the what the user wants to send by email

user_input_summary.description: A short summary of what the user wants to send by email

delayDescription.description: The delay to wait until the email is sent, expressed in text. Example: 'in 1h', 'wait 3h', etc.

delayInDuration.description: The delay to wait until the email is sent, expressed in seconds. Example of 1h delay: 3600

status.description: The status of registaring the delay job for sending the email
